roleset.name: conquer again
roleset.note: RECONQUEST-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from reconquest.01-v)

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: however it would be fun to let the Mexico Army reconquest them and kick all the white people out as illegal aliens .

example.name: all args, passive
example.text: This Cathedral started to be built in 1147, when-2 [the city of Lisboa]-1 was reconquested *-1 from the Moors, by the first king of Portugal, Dom Afonso Henriques *-2 .
example.arg: by the first king of Portugal, Dom Afonso Henriques
